messages.subject: Re: Conservative Homeschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... Welcome, Liz. :) I m a Christian and they seem to like me okay.  You ve pretty much described the style of Christianity that you re not, the precepts of
messages.messageBody:
----------
>From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2902
>Date: Mon, Jan 20, 2003, 7:37 PM
>

> I just have a quick question. I'm a new subscriber to the list (referred by
> a fellow unschooler from another list) and wondered if Christians are
> welcome here. Maybe I just joined at a bad time?


Welcome, Liz. :) I'm a Christian and they seem to like me okay. <g>

You've pretty much described the style of Christianity that you're not, the
precepts of which are likely to be challenged here. I think you'll find this
a pretty good list (you certainly have the requisite senses -- humor and
common! ;)

Pam "Christian Lite" Hartley
(G-d and I have an arrangement)
